definitions.definition: A small anvil -shaped bone in the middle ear .
an accessory cloud , in the shape of an anvil which forms by spreading at the top of a cumulonimbus .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) A small anvil -shaped bone in the middle ear .
secondary_definitions: ( meteorology ) an accessory cloud , in the shape of an anvil which forms by spreading at the top of a cumulonimbus .
